react-js.name: React (with ACUL JS SDK)
react-js.description: React sample using @auth0/auth0-acul-js SDK with 3 authentication screens

screens.name: Login
screens.description: Universal login screen with social providers and form authentication

screens.name: Login: Identifier First
screens.description: Identifier-first login flow for collecting email/username

screens.name: Login: Password
screens.description: Password entry screen for authentication

react.name: React (with ACUL React SDK)
react.description: Advanced React sample using @auth0/auth0-acul-react SDK with 30+ authentication screens

screens.name: Login Identifier First
screens.description: Screen for displaying identifier-first login flow

screens.name: Login: Passwordless SMS OTP
screens.description: Passwordless SMS OTP entry screen for authentication

screens.name: Login: Passwordless Email Code
screens.description: Passwordless Email Code entry screen for authentication

screens.name: Reset Password: Email
screens.description: Resend Email screen for password reset

screens.name: Reset Password
screens.description: Screen for password reset

screens.name: Reset Password: Success
screens.description: Screen for successful password reset

screens.name: Reset Password: Error
screens.description: Screen for failed password reset

screens.name: Signup Identifier First
screens.description: Identifier-first signup flow for collecting user registration details with required and optional fields

screens.name: Signup Password
screens.description: Password entry screen for user registration

screens.name: MFA Login Options
screens.description: Screen to login via multi-factor authentication (MFA) factors with various options

screens.name: Signup
screens.description: Screen for user registration

screens.name: Passkey Enrollment
screens.description: Screen for passkey enrollment

screens.name: Passkey Enrollment Local
screens.description: Screen for passkey enrollment local

screens.name: MFA Begin Enroll Options
screens.description: Screen to begin enrolling in multi-factor authentication (MFA) with various options

screens.name: MFA Email Challenge
screens.description: Screen for MFA email challenge

screens.name: MFA SMS Challenge
screens.description: MFA SMS challenge screen for authentication

screens.name: MFA SMS Enrollment
screens.description: Screen for enrolling in SMS-based multi-factor authentication (MFA)

screens.name: MFA Enroll Result
screens.description: Screen displaying response of MFA Enrollment

screens.name: MFA Push Challenge Push
screens.description: Screen for enrolling in Push-based multi-factor authentication (MFA)

screens.name: MFA Push Welcome
screens.description: Welcome Screen for enrolling in Push-based multi-factor authentication (MFA)

screens.name: MFA SMS List
screens.description: Screen to list and manage SMS-based multi-factor authentication (MFA) methods

screens.name: Email Identifier Challenge
screens.description: Screen for collecting email identifier during authentication

screens.name: Login
screens.description: Universal login screen with social providers and form authentication

metadata.description: Auth0 Advanced Customizations for Universal Login (ACUL) sample templates for multiple frameworks and SDKs
